name: devil dance
description:
This is devil dance, a parody of Everhood (because why not?) . if you don't know Everhood You deserve death and eternal damnation.

Warning! This game looks so ugly that it might hurt or injury the eyes of the ones that are accustomed to beauty. We thank you for your understanding of the situation and not take responsabilty of the traumas or suicides caused directly or indirectly by this game.

Controls:

-1, 2, 3 on the numpad to move

-escape to pause

Music: Compute It With Some Devilish Alcoholic Steampunk Engines from Camellia
